name: Establish Public Financing for Oakland Elections
title: Establish Public Financing for Oakland Elections
summary: Shall the Measure amending the Oakland Municipal Code and City Charter to establish resident public financing for candidate election campaigns, increase transparency regarding independent spending in City elections, further restrict former city officials from acting as lobbyists, and provide additional resources to the Public Ethics Commission for implementation be adopted?

supporting_organizations.name: Oakland Rising Committee Sponsored by Movement Strategy Center Action Fund
supporting_organizations.payee: Oakland Rising Committee Sponsored by Movement Strategy Center Action Fund

supporting_organizations.name: Yes on W, Oakland Fair Elections, Sponsored by Civic Advocacy Organizations
supporting_organizations.payee: Yes on W, Oakland Fair Elections, Sponsored by Civic Advocacy Organizations
